thread.title: Internet & Gaming Cafe

title: Internet & Gaming Cafe
text: Questions Business Summary This Internet Gaming Cafe for sale is a clean well established business for gaming fun. Wide selection of PC games and state-of-the-art systems will keeps clients entertained for hours. Whether they want to level up in World of Warcraft or jump in to some fast-paced, head-to-head action against your friends in Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 2. This unique well established buisness relocated to this newly renovated location in January 2009 into an emculate facility currently houses 23 gaming stations, each equipped with comfortable chairs, an internet connection bursting up to 20Mbit/s and the fastest gaming rigs each featured with 22'' widescreen monitors and a brand new store layout providing the most comfortable entertainment experience in town. While catering to gaming crowd, the successful business also provide services to type up a resume, check your email account or just kill some time with some good old, aimless internet surfing! It offers a drug-free and bully-free environment, established in the community for over 6 years running! Snacks, pop, quick hot food options are also provided creating an extra revenue stream for the business. The business is often used by for families for family nights, birthday parties, tournaments or just hanging out and playing with your friends. The Business throws off a great sallary for the current owners while still leaving excess cashflow for the business for other things. Please contact us for more details on how you can become a proud owner of business that will allow you to make comfortable income, provide a great return on investment while building an asset that that can be sold for profilt at a later date. Financials
